nodes.text: The Bitemark was a starship that was purchased by the Trandoshan bounty hunter Bossk by 3 ABY. Shortly after the purchase, the ship was destroyed during an explosive firefight on the Jurzan spaceport between the bounty hunter and the smugglers Han Solo and Chewbacca.
The Bitemark was mentioned in "Tooth and Claw," a short story written by Michael Kogge and published in the From a Certain Point of View: The Empire Strikes Back anthology in 2020.
